title: Although I have lots of storage available on my phone and on GDrive, new pics dont show up in Photos
content:
I have plenty of storage on my phone and on my Google Drive. However, since earlier this week, when I take a new picture, it doesn't show up on Google Photos. What can it stem from?

To be clear, they do show up in Files and when I look at the path, they are in the Camera folder (despite not showing on Camera roll).

I also tried clearing cache.
